sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Spinner from '../spinner'; import axios from '../Axios'; export default function VacationDataTable(props) { const initialState = { loading: false, data:[], error: null, } const [vacation, setVacation] = useState(initialState); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`consultants/${props.mcode}/vacations?select=name`).then((result)=>{ console.log(result) setVacation({ loading: false, data:result.data.data, error: null, }) }).catch((err)=>{console.log(err); setVacation({ loading: false, data:[], error: "" })}) },[]); return (
{vacation.loading ? : {/* {vacation.data && vacation.data.map((option,index) => ( ))} */}
№ Төлөв Аяллын нэр Хугацаа Хуваарь Хуулах Үнэ Засах Нэмсэн
{index+1} {option.role} {option.email} {option.lastName} {option.firstName} {option.phone}
}
) }
